Pepper ( Piper nigrum L) belongs to the Piperaceae family and is one of the well-known spices globally. It is commonly used as a household spice as a food additive and condiment. In addition, it is also used in traditional medicine for various medicinal purposes in many countries.
8 Piperine is a major alkaloid and a pungent nitrogenous substance present in the pepper fruit. Pharmacological studies on the activity of piperine have reported that it has anti-inflammatory and analgesic effect,
